title: Buy Championship Ashe and raise money for charity

replies.body: Thank you riot. glad to see you doing it again and on my favorite champion. Been a lot of disappointment (the skin itself) but this is the high point of the year for me. Moments like this make it easier to put up with all the trolls and bugs or less thoughts of just going rage troll mode on own team so thanks
Ashe is your favourite how boring are you
that's really cool that you're supporting charity
The Chroma will be made available later this patch during the worlds event. It will cost 320 Worlds Tokens.

I feel bad for supporting the pros, but feel good for supporting charity.
I feel good that I got an awesome new skin, and feel bad that I am $15 less.

hashtagconflicted. 
But it is a cool skin and I have no problem supporting creativity :D
dude dont play poppy jungle again, u r very suck at this
lol you were that talon that suicided and lost the game. As well as flaming our top laner
Fuckin league community, never change lmao

I am sick and tired of this EQUALITY PROPAGANDA BS. Children are not equal to adults in rights or and therefore should not be considered equals because if you gave children the right to vote, Western Civilization might as well be as good as dead.

Sorry Riot Games but I do not want to fund a feminist or egalitarian agenda. You might as well want to tell your fellow men to let barbaric savages enforce a New Dark Age because you think people who are more stupid, more crazy, more weak, more irresponsible and more inferior are equal to those who are superior and are better in every way.

Equality is a lie that is indoctrinated and brainwashed into younger generations and train them to commit cultural suicide.

In what way were they talking about the right to vote the only equality they were talking about is that all children should have the right to an education and if you say that is wrong drop out of school or uni if your in one and then pretend that you won't be able to learn at one or go to one. That you would not have the education required to get a job. I'm sick of poeple like you who believe that the disadvantaged poeple shouldnt get support.

Propaganda-information, especially of a biased or misleading nature, used to promote a political cause or point of view.   In what way are they misleading us. What way are they biased by giving us the choice
Anyways if your talking about the right to vote what charity it goes to if they buy the skin and alot will they should have a choice where the money goes
Riot, where is the chroma for this skin ?{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
